mutants.code:
import re

def count_maximum_odds(str):
    pattern = re.compile('o(.*?)d(.*?)d')
    n = 1
    while pattern.search(str):
        n += 1
        str = pattern.sub('\\1\\2', str, count=1)
    return n

import re

def count_maximum_odds(str):
    pattern = re.compile('o(.*?)d(.*?)d')
    n = -1
    while pattern.search(str):
        n += 1
        str = pattern.sub('\\1\\2', str, count=1)
    return n

import re

def count_maximum_odds(str):
    pattern = re.compile('o(.*?)d(.*?)d')
    n = 0
    while pattern.search(str):
        n -= 1
        str = pattern.sub('\\1\\2', str, count=1)
    return n

import re

def count_maximum_odds(str):
    pattern = re.compile('o(.*?)d(.*?)d')
    n = 0
    while pattern.search(str):
        n += 1
        str = pattern.sub('\\1\\2', str, count=-1)
    return n
